about_the_game:
It is an album that describes the various atmospheres of the Earth, which is approaching the Third World War step by step and the futuristic story contexts of O.A.C: World Begins!

While preparing the album, I spent months on each of them and based everything on mathematics.

How to make?
The entire album was prepared digitally. D# Major - D# Minor - C# Major : The melodies are predominant and the emotional transitions are planned to represent the ambience, which represents a triumph in the worrying and often unrest.


All instruments I used in the album:

Pianos/Keyboards: Grand piano, Electric piano, Ragtime Piano, Church organ, Harpischord
Guitars: Electro, Lead, Acoustic, Bass | Pedals / Tecnique: Distortion, Slap Bass, Muted, Clean
Drums / Percussion: Electric Drum, Acoustic Drum, Steel Drum, Xylophone, Vibraphone
Strings: Violin, Cello, Concert Harp, Pizzicato
Wind instruments: Trombone, Flute, Saxaphone, French Horn
Electronic: 8 Bit, Scfi, Syntch pluck, Smooth Synth
Traditional: Sitar, Koto
Music Box: Synth Bass
